title: Software Engineering
desc: I'm a software engineer with a strong foundation in Object-Oriented Programming and can creatively utilise Data Structures for more efficient programs.

title: Machine Learning
desc: I have created several ML applications and have successfully worked on projects involving NLP, CV and image recognition to improve my understanding of ML applications.

title: Internet of Things
desc: As someone specialising in IoT, I enjoy building systems end-to-end with a user-centric focus, touching upon a wide array of skills including machine learning, data science, electrical engineering and more.
